name: Sanfengzhu.GitHub.com
body:
**Welcome to Zhusanfeng Pages.**


## Education:
  2014.09-Present        B.S.  School of Software, Dalian University of Technology.  
 2010.09-2014.06        M.S.  School of Software, Dalian University of Technology.

## Awards:
 2014        The First Prize Scholarship of Graduates.  
 2011-2013      Learning Merit Scholarship (top 20%, 3 times).

## Research:
### 2014-Present     Probability-Based Acoustic Source Localization Schemes Using Dual-Microphone Smartphones.  
We propose novel acoustic source localization schemes, which use binary information and probability to locate the source with randomly deployed dual-microphone smartphones.

## Social Activities:
  2014-Present   Graduate Deputy Secretary of the Communist Youth League.  
 2010-2013      The class group secretary.

## Publications:
 1. Sanfeng Zhu, Naigao Jin, Xueshu Zheng, Han Yao, Shuailing Yang, Lei Wang. A Probability-Based Acoustic Source Localization Scheme Using Dual-Microphone Smartphones. IEEE International Conference on Communications (ICC), 2015.  
 2. Sanfeng Zhu, Naigao Jin, Han Yao, Zhenxing Ji, Xueshu Zheng, Lei Wang. Probability-Based Acoustic Source Localization Schemes Using Dual-Hydrophone Sensor in Underwater Sensor Network. IEEE Sensor Journal, 2015. (在投)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
